short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly export Shopify product data as JSON files with a single click. Easy, efficient, and automatic!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to easily fetch and download product data from Shopify stores in JSON format, making it simple to retrieve product information with minimal effort. Just open the Shopify store page, click the extension icon, and select 'Fetch Products' to export all data instantly as a JSON file.

Key Features:
▪️ Single-click operation: Fetch products instantly with no setup.
▪️ Automatic JSON downloads: Save product data files directly to your device.
▪️ Unlimited access: Retrieve unlimited products from any Shopify store.
▪️ Intuitive design: Clean, modern popup interface for a smooth experience.

How to Use:
▪️ Navigate to any Shopify website and open the desired product page.
▪️ Click the extension icon to open the popup.
▪️ Select ‘Fetch Products’ and follow the prompt to download the JSON file.

Benefits:
▪️ Free to start
▪️ Easy export and download in JSON format
▪️ Supports unlimited data downloads
▪️ The extension is designed to streamline data exporting for Shopify products, with a ▪️ quick setup and simple interface.
